1.0.name: wordpress/dm-instagram
1.0.description:
DM Instagram allows you to share / display your latest photos on your wordpress website. You can display the images on your posts and pages using a shortcode, or on any widget-ready area using the DM Instagram widget.

Special Thanks

  • Fotorama

Additional Resources

  • Have a question? Or found a bug?
  • Follow me @donMhico

Features:

  • Responsive-ready template
  • Option to use Fotorama as the viewer
  • Ability to display as a default gallery or with stunning slider with thumbnail navigation
  • Allow touch and mouse drag thumbnail navigation
  • Very easy to get it running
  • Ability to choose transition animation
  • Allow autoplay
  • User-defined interval time
  • Supports sh
